Services

I like to do many things

Website Design

Wether its a single landing page, or a fully functional multi page responsive website i carry out the process from beginning to end with all your personal needs in mind.

FullStack Applications

We can create the app you need with whatever functionality you require.

Mobile Applications

We can create the app you need for iOS/Android devices

Sound Design

Need specific sounds for your app/website? No problem, we also do sound design for film/TV/games

Process

All projects follow a tried and tested creative process to ensure happiness on both ends, and to ensure clients get exactly what they want.

1

Discuss The Project

We will begin with an initial meeting where a general discussion of the project will take place - what does the client need and for what purpose?

2

Brainstorming & Concept

We will then discuss various ideas for the project - How does the client want the app/site to feel? what kind of functionality is required?

3

Site/App Planning

We will then begin to plan out the site/app, mockups/wireframes will be created and a final plan will be decided upon.

4

Interaction

We promise to always keep you in the loop during the course of your project - Regular progress reports with clients and changing of features and look/feel if necessary.
